name: Agent Skyfall
description:
Made for the SpaceJam's Jam!

Game might feel laggy a little bit. It is mainly due to the web version. When I have
time I will upload a Windows version as well. 

There may be bugs in the game left. I did not have the full 72 hours to work on the game. I spent about 30 hours total on it. This is also the reason the balancing may not be perfect.

Extra game knowledge for devoted players:

- fighting enemies in a disadvantageous situation will earn you more points! (1000 instead of 500)

Features that I wanted that I did not have time to include:

- Crashing to the ground after 30 rounds

- Gaining perks every round as well as reinforcements

- Underworld after breaking through the ground

- Different types of enemy

- Different types of agents

- Online Leaderboard
